wordpressPost.title: How do you engage your employees on #goEarthDay?
wordpressPost.content:
WeSpire organized a Twitter panel ahead of #EarthDay2016 and it was a fast-paced conversation led by our customers, who are among the world’s leading corporate sustainability all-stars.

The discussion convened around the #goEarthDay hashtag and seven thought-provoking questions. Here’s a sample of the lively chat! If you want to see more from this conversation, follow us on @goWeSpire. We’d hear what you’re doing to honor Earth Day this year!
